remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示轉換器產生任何值，可能會傳回後援 （如果有的話） 或預設應該改為使用值。 may be returned to indicate that the converter produced no value and that the fallback (if available) or default value should be used instead. 傳遞`null`如`parameter`。Pass `null` for `parameter`. 這必要參數的簽章，而且用來提供內容資訊給轉換器; 某些實作，但不是用於這個類別。This parameter is required by the signature of , and is used by some implementations to provide contextual information to the converter; but it is not used in this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從繫結目標移到繫結來源值時，資料繫結引擎會呼叫這個方法。The data binding engine calls this method when it moves a value from the binding target to the binding source. 表示轉換器產生任何值，可能會傳回後援 （如果有的話） 或預設應該改為使用值。 may be returned to indicate that the converter produced no value and that the fallback (if available) or default value should be used instead. 傳遞`null`如`parameter`。Pass `null` for `parameter`. 這必要參數的簽章，而且用來提供內容資訊給轉換器; 某些實作，但不是用於這個類別。This parameter is required by the signature of , and is used by some implementations to provide contextual information to the converter; but it is not used in this class.
